data.name: Adventure Climb VR
data.detailed_description:
Adventure Climb VR

Adventure Climb VR is a FREE room-scale climbing experience consisting of a short one level adventure through the Canyon. Achieve triumph through a rock climbing challenge designed by actual rock climbers. Race to the top, or explore the various Easter Eggs and SECRET Locations.

The Story

As climbers, we originally built this game as a test to explore different manners of locomotion. We enjoyed crafting this experience so much that we decided to demo it at a major climbing event, where we were in turn asked to release it.

After debating for a while, we decided to give it a try- a ONE LEVEL release for FREE for YOU!

With that in mind, we’d like to remind players that this is a ONE LEVEL OPEN BETA, but don’t let the objective of finishing this level distract you from the numerous Easter Eggs and Secret Locations. As an open Beta we will be adding accessibility components as well as additional features, so keep an ear to the ground!

If you enjoy the experience let us know by using #ACVR on socials, commenting below, or emailing us at ACVR@MXTreality.com. For more ACVR info, stay tuned to this page.

Features

  • Explore the Canyon climbing area by finding easter eggs or even going off track.

  • Immerse yourself in different climbing styles assembled by veteran rock climbers.

  • Race with friends or yourself to get the best possible time!

  • Crafted with small groups in mind. Race amongst friends, or collaborate on the off-track Easter eggs.

  • Unlock achievements by completing special tasks

    We are the first VR game to support Cilia by Haptic Sol one of the first VR smells devices.Adventure Climb features 4 scents from the Cilia Libary.Pick one up for your game here > https://hapticsol.com/cilia/cilia-acvr

data.short_description: Adventure Climb VR is a FREE room-scale climbing experience consisting of a short one level adventure through the Canyon. Achieve triumph through a rock climbing challenge designed by actual rock climbers. Race to the top, or explore the various Easter Eggs and SECRET Locations.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or later, Windows 10
  • Processor: CPU: I5-2500k or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 (AMD Radeon R9 290) or better.
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: It will run and you will climb.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or later, Windows 10
  • Processor: CPU: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX 480 equivalent or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: It will run and you will climb to the best of your ability.
